description: Returns metadata for a single image.

uuid: The unique identifier of the target image.

author: String
The username of the person who uploaded the image.
uuid: The unique ID of the image.
extension: The file type extension for the image.
thumbnail: Returns true if this image has had a thumbnail version created.
animated: Returns true if this image is a gif with more than one frame.
timeUploaded: The datetime when the image was uploaded. Format is 'Year-Month-Day Hour:Minute:Second'
url: A direct to the target image.
thumbnailURL: A direct to the target image's thumbnail. If the image has no thumbnail, the full sized image will be served instead.
